template.name: Simple Live Card
template.description: Creates a new service that publishes a live card to the Glass timeline.

parameter.name: Service Name
parameter.help: The name of the service class to create.

parameter.name: Service Title
parameter.help: The human-readable name of the service. For services with voice triggers, this name will appear in the disambiguation menu if multiple Glassware share that trigger.

parameter.name: Live card uses direct rendering?
parameter.help: If checked, this creates a direct rendering callback that draws the layout using a background thread. If unchecked, the layout will be set into the live card using RemoteViews.

parameter.name: Launcher Activity
parameter.help: If true, this Glassware will be launchable through a voice trigger.
